publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4451 Tricia Marwick on behalf of the Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill Committee: Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill be passed.
